divs: Sighting DetailsSitting on porch at rented beach house and observed bright orange light and then a formation of white twinkling lights. This occurred several times throughout the night in different places in the night sky.
Summary: Bright orange light with white twinkling lights
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Surfside Beach
There were no other sightings in Surfside Beach on or around July 18th 2012
